question:
Question: What is the correct summary of your trajectory from the start to the current location?  
Choice: A. I start from a high-rise building, descend to street level, and move toward a bus stop.  
           B. I start from the park and fly over a road and several buildings before arriving at my current location.  
           C. I start from the high-rise balcony and fly toward the street.  
           D. I start from the roof of the building, move horizontally to the right, then descend toward the street, toward the bus stop.  
           E. I start from the residential area, fly over the road, approach a certain building group, and reach my current location near the bus stop.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: D; Reason: The trajectory starts from a high vantage point near the roof of a building, moves horizontally to the right across the buildings, and then descends towards the street level, approaching a bus stop area. This matches the description in option D.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 27)]
Option: D
Reason: The video starts from a high vantage point near the roof of a building (0-7s), moves horizontally to the right across the buildings (7-20s), and then descends towards the street level, approaching a bus stop area (20-27s). This matches the description in option D.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: D; Reason: The trajectory starts from a high vantage point near the roof of a building, moves horizontally to the right across the buildings, and then descends towards the street level, approaching a bus stop area. This matches the description in option D.
